name: Lycanroc Dusk

passive.name: Resilient
passive.effect: This Pokemon takes 10 less damage from attacks for each time the Defending Pokemon has evolved.

attacks.name: Finish the Fight
attacks.effect: Deals 10 damage for every 5 cards in your discard pile.

flavor: It overcame great adversity and maintained a belief in the goodness of the world to take this rare form.
